sense.def:
An idea
je načrt ali možen potek dogajanja.

seg.quote: It's a good idea to get some instruction.
I don't like the idea of going to ask for money.

sense.def:
One's idea of something
je človekovo prepričanje o tem, kakšno nekaj je ali bi moralo biti.

seg.quote: People had some odd ideas about village children.
What's your idea of a good party?
They had many ideas on how films should be made.

sense.def:
To have an idea of something
pomeni do določene mere vedeti kaj o nečem.

seg.quote: He has a good idea of how the Civil Service functions.
Have you any idea how much it would cost?

sense.def:
To have an idea that something is the case
pomeni sumiti, da je nekaj tako, kot je videti.

seg.quote: My friends had an idea that something was wrong.

sense.def:
The idea of an action or activity
je cilj ali namen nekega dejanja ali dejavnosti.

seg.quote: The idea is to try and avoid further expense.
